SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM COMTNONLINEPOLLMANAGE A WHERE 1=1 AND A.POLL_ID IN (SELECT DISTINCT(POLL_ID) POLL_ID FROM COMTNONLINEPOLLIEM) AND A.POLL_DSUSE_ENNC = 'N' AND (( A.POLL_ATMC_DSUSE_ENNC = 'N') OR (A.POLL_ATMC_DSUSE_ENNC = 'Y' AND TO_CHAR(NOW(),'YYYYmmdd') >= REPLACE(A.POLL_BGNDE,'-','') AND TO_CHAR(NOW(),'YYYYmmdd') <= REPLACE(A.POLL_ENDDE,'-','')))
AND POLL_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')

SELECT A.POLL_ID, A.POLL_NM, A.POLL_BGNDE POLL_BEGIN_DE, A.POLL_ENDDE POLL_END_DE, A.POLL_KND POLL_KIND_CODE, A.POLL_DSUSE_ENNC, A.POLL_ATMC_DSUSE_ENNC, A.FRST_REGISTER_ID, A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM FRST_REGISTER_PNTTM, A.FRST_REGISTER_ID, A.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, A.LAST_UPDUSR_ID FROM COMTNONLINEPOLLMANAGE A WHERE 1=1 AND A.POLL_ID=#{pollId}
SELECT POLL_ID, POLL_IEM_ID, POLL_IEM_NM, FRST_REGISTER_ID, FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, LAST_UPDUSR_ID, LAST_UPDT_PNTTM FROM COMTNONLINEPOLLIEM WHERE 1=1 AND POLL_ID = #{pollId} ORDER BY POLL_IEM_NM DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMTNONLINEPOLLRESULT ( POLL_ID, POLL_IEM_ID, POLL_RESULT_ID, FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, FRST_REGISTER_ID, LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, LAST_UPDUSR_ID )VALUES( #{pollId}, #{pollIemId}, #{pollResultId}, NOW(), #{frstRegisterId}, NOW(), #{lastUpdusrId} )
mapper.select: SELECT A.POLL_IEM_ID, COUNT(A.POLL_IEM_ID) POLL_IEM_ID_CNT, (100/ (SELECT COUNT(*) CNT FROM COMTNONLINEPOLLRESULT WHERE POLL_ID = A.POLL_ID)) * COUNT(A.POLL_IEM_ID),1 POLL_IEM_PERCENT FROM COMTNONLINEPOLLRESULT A WHERE 1=1 AND A.POLL_ID = #{pollId} GROUP BY A.POLL_ID, A.POLL_IEM_ID
